answer: The median human evaluation score for Gemini 2.5 Pro under HIPc conditions is 7.5 (from the study presented in the paper "A Quantitative Study of Prompt-Induced Hallucination in Large Language Models," arXiv:2505.00557). This score is compared to the other six large language models tested, with Gemini 2.5 Pro performing better than, for example, Gemini 3 Pro (40%) and Deepseek Search (68%), but worse than ChatGPT Search (67%) and Perplexity Pro (45%).
